abilities.name: Center
abilities.description: Increase willpower for all allies in the radius by 2

abilities.name: Fire Breath
abilities.description: Breath fire in a conical area that deals <25+WIL> heat damage

abilities.name: Ice Shards
abilities.description: Ice shards pierce upwards and deal <25+WIL> cold damage

abilities.name: Acid Spit
abilities.description: A corrosive spray erupts forward dealing <25+WIL> acid damage

abilities.name: Detonate
abilities.description: Explosive energy radiates outwards dealing <25+WIL> explosive damage

abilities.name: Thunder Cross
abilities.description: Electric energy blasts forward and backward dealing <25+WIL> electric damage

abilities.name: Viral Cloud
abilities.description: Produce a viral cloud in the area dealing <25+WIL> viral damage

abilities.name: Empoison
abilities.description: Poison a singleunit dealing <30+WIL> toxic damage

abilities.name: Energy Blast
abilities.description: Create a blast of energy dealing <25+WIL> pulse damage in a small area

abilities.name: Gamma Tendrils
abilities.description: Tendtrils of gamma radiation deal <25+WIL> radiation damage in a straight line

abilities.name: Void Scream
abilities.description: Deal <25+WIL> crushing gravity damage in a forward and backward cone

abilities.name: Aim
abilities.description: Increase dexterity for all allies in the radius by 2

abilities.name: Scan
abilities.description: Reveal detailed information of units in the area (stats, abilities etc.)

abilities.name: Prepared Shot
abilities.description: Reduce turn move to 0. Until next turn, you will fire at the first unit that comes into range of your equipped gun, dealing <DEX%> increased damage.

abilities.name: Gunner
abilities.description: While there is no melee weapon in your inventory, increase max health and speed by <10+END%>

abilities.name: Expert Sighting
abilities.description: Ranged attacks will never hit units blocking LOS of your target.

abilities.name: Instruct
abilities.description: Increase skill by <WIL%> + <WIL*2>

abilities.name: Shout
abilities.description: Increase power by <WIL%> + <WIL*2>

abilities.name: Focus
abilities.description: Increase tactics by <WIL%> + <WIL*2>

abilities.name: Energize
abilities.description: Transfer up to <END*4%> of your current energy to the target unit

abilities.name: Bolster
abilities.description: Increase endurance for all allies in the radius by 2

abilities.name: Rest
abilities.description: Restore <25+END> current health and <5+WIL/2> current energy (Increased by tactics)

abilities.name: Flare
abilities.description: Reveal stealthed/hidden units and items in the area. Units in the area will face away the center node

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: Become hidden. Your speed is reduced by <40-AGI*2%>, and you lose 15 energy per turn. Attacking from stealth deals 30 bonus damage. You cannot enter stealth if the rest of your team is dead, unconscious, or hidden. You will also be revealed if an enemy tries to move to your current node, or you if perform another attack or action.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Use your reaction to reduce an incoming attack by <AGI*4%>

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Use your reaction to reduce incoming AoE based damage by <AGI*4%>

abilities.name: Quick Attack
abilities.description: Make a speedy attack with your equipped weapon, entering the turn order at <30+AGI*1.50%> charge

abilities.name: Agitate
abilities.description: Reduce the target’s morale, lowering all stats for the duration of the combat by 1

abilities.name: Cheer
abilities.description: Increase agility for all allies in the radius by 2

abilities.name: Climber
abilities.description: Add <STR/4> to your jump passively

abilities.name: Counter Attack
abilities.description: Use your reaction to make a counterattack when hit

abilities.name: Guile
abilities.description: Increase the unit's charisma by 3

abilities.name: Poison Weapon
abilities.description: Coat your equipped {melee} weapon with poison, causing your next <INT/2> strikes to poison the target. The poison deals <5+INT/3%> of the unit's max health for 5 turns.

abilities.name: Interrupt
abilities.description: Strike a unit with your {melee} weapon, reducing the charge of any casting ability by <20+DEX*2%> and reducing the unit's current turn charge by <10+DEX%>

abilities.name: Dictate
abilities.description: Increase intelligence for all allies in the radius by 2

abilities.name: Repair
abilities.description: Repair a mechanical unit for <15+DEX*2%> max health

abilities.name: Resist UP
abilities.description: All units gain <WIL*5%> resistance to all elements for <1+CHA/2> turns

abilities.name: Mech Cloak
abilities.description: After being hit, use your reaction to release a wave of electricity, dealing <20+END> base shock damage

abilities.name: Flare Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 15 heat damage

abilities.name: Cryo Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 15 cold damage

abilities.name: Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 15 explosive damage

abilities.name: Corrosive Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 15 acid damage

abilities.name: Shock Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 15 shock damage

abilities.name: Bio Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 15 viral damage

abilities.name: Toxic Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 15 poison damage

abilities.name: EMP Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that that deals 15 pulse damage

abilities.name: Unstable Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 15 radiation damage

abilities.name: Void Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 15 gravity damage

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Legs
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's legs, increasing agility by 3

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Arms
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's arms, increasing strength by 3

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Brain
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's cerebral cortex, increasing intelligence by 3

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Eyes
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's eyes, increasing dexterity by 3

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Lungs
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's resperitory system, increasing endurance by 3

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Heart
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's body, increasing willpower by 3

abilities.name: Battlecry
abilities.description: Increase strength for all allies in the radius by 2

abilities.name: Heroic Leap
abilities.description: Jump to a neighboring hex with a jump distance of <JMP+STR/2> (minimum 3) and immediately make an attack with your equipped weapon, hitting all units in range dealing <15+CHA%> additional damage

abilities.name: Heroic Charge
abilities.description: Charge to a tile with a move of <MOV+AGI/3> (minimum 2) and immediately make an attack with your equipped {melee} weapon, hitting all units in range dealing <15+CHA%> additional damage

abilities.name: Power Attack
abilities.description: Make a {melee} attack dealing <25+STR*2%> Additional Damage

abilities.name: Power Shot
abilities.description: Make a {ranged} attack dealing <25+DEX*2%> Additional Damage

abilities.name: Hardy
abilities.description: All damage taken is reduced by <END*2%>

abilities.name: Vengeance
abilities.description: All melee damage dealt is increased by 25% when low health. Low health is anything under <WIL+END%>

abilities.name: Reversal
abilities.description: Make an attack with your equipped {melee} weapon, then switch places with your target

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: Slam a unit, knocking it back <1+STR/5> units. Hitting a wall deals 30 damage, hitting another unit deals 10 damage to both units

abilities.name: Opportunity
abilities.description: When a unit moves out of your melee range, use your reaction to make an attack against it, dealing <INT*5%> bonus damage

abilities.name: Quick Draw
abilities.description: Switching a weapon from inventory returns you into the turn order at <75+AGI%> charge

abilities.name: Momentum
abilities.description: Restore <4+END/5%> energy at the end of each turn

abilities.name: First Aid
abilities.description: Heal a unit in melee range for <25+CHA*2%> of their maximum health

abilities.name: Resuscitate
abilities.description: Bring an unconscious unit back to life with 1 health. The target gains <50+AGI*5+DEX*5%> bonus speed until their next turn

abilities.name: Healing Field
abilities.description: Build a healing field bot with <50+INT*5> health. Every turn the field heals units in a <2+INT/4> hex radius for <10+INT/2+CHA/2>

abilities.name: Recovery
abilities.description: Recover <1+END/3%> max health at the end of each turn

abilities.name: Sprint
abilities.description: Use your action to move <AGI/2> additional units

abilities.name: Precision Strike
abilities.description: Perform an attack with a {melee} weapon, striking a vital point to decrease the target’s healing received permanently by <STR*2%>

abilities.name: Cripple
abilities.description: Perform an attack with a {ranged} weapon, striking a vital point to decrease the targets next movement by <1+DEX/5>

abilities.name: Shield Boost
abilities.description: Upgrade an ally’s shield temporarily, boosting its maximum and current capacity by <20+WIL*5%> for <INT> turns

abilities.name: Concentrate
abilities.description: Increase casting speed by <125+WIL*10%> for <WIL> turns.

abilities.name: Influence
abilities.description: Increase charisma for all allies in the radius by 2
